regen.absent_element: associating roles with divisions for new users
regen.new_specification: The system shall associate the appropriate roles with the divisions for new users when saving their information.

regen.absent_element: associating roles with divisions for new users

regen.new_specification: The system shall associate roles with divisions when adding new users to the system.

absence: action of associating the new user with the divisions
